name: elastic-job-cloud
description: Elastic-Job-Cloud is a distributed scheduled job cloud solution designed with HA and fault-tolerance in mind. It focuses on horizontal scaling, and provides transient and daemon jobs, event and schedule based job triggers, job dependencies, and job history.
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.
postInstallNotes:
Service installed.

It is recommended to access this service through the endpoint created in Elastic-Job-Cloud.

Default login: `root`/`root`. Agents must install jdk 1.7+ .
postUninstallNotes: The Elastic-Job-Cloud DC/OS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
